sub_title: Managing Director TraXall Belgium - Fleet & Mobility Excellence
summary:
+31 6 5469 5399
Extensive international background with main focus on General Management - Sales - Business Development - Partner Management - New Market Management including leadership level. 
Strong in newly created positions and bringing existing roles to the next level.

- Connecting People
- Result Driven
- Creative
- Curious
- Drive
- Quality focussed

I have developed local operations into international unified footprints including building sales teams. My nature of being a self-starter, pragmatic, developer and connecting people in a multi-cultural environment has helped me to be successful. 

Deeply involved into Belgian operations and business. Strong understanding of the Belgian culture and business practices.

I encourage honesty, creativity, knowledge sharing, freedom to think and empowering others as everybody has their unique valuable qualities. Working towards goals can be a long climb over bumpy and winding roads, but never give up as the achievement makes it worth.

Main expertise areas:
- General Management (MD level)
- Developing international sales organisations
- Initiating general & commercial strategies
- Sales & account management of major international corporates
- Consulting management including developing service excellence
- Business partnership management
- Operations
- Start-up
- Automotive | Fleet | Mobility | Leasing

Business industries:  a vision and passion that matches to my values prevail over industry.

In private life I like to do sports, especially running and race cycling

Please call me: +31 6 5469 5399
or write me an e-mail: leomont@focusnorth.eu

school.name: Hanzehogeschool Groningen / Hanze University of Applied Sciences Groningen

profile_positions.description:
Traxall Belgium, as part of Traxall International, is the leading fleet outsourcing company in Belgium. 

A very successful company with a great corporate client base that outsource their fleet management to gain efficiency, control and savings in relation to cost and administration. 

With our 35 highly professional and skilled people as well as strong levels of automation, managing 20.000 cars, we are fully focussed on delivering endless service excellence with the aim to have 100% happy clients and employees.
profile_positions.title: Managing Director

profile_positions.description:
Helping companies growing their (international) business through initiating, implementing and executing their corporate and commercial strategy.

- General Management
- International Business Development Management
- Driving & supporting the management strategy
- Change Mangement
- Fleet consulting
- Process optimization and service excellence programs

I have an excellent track record in (inter)national general and commercial management at leadership level. 

In addition, I have founded international sales teams concluded new country partnerships as well as new country openings.

Strong knowledge of the Automotive | Fleet | Mobility | Leasing Industry.
profile_positions.title: International Business Leader developing and managing growth strategies. Focus north

profile_positions.description:
Traxall International is the leading Business Process Outsourcing company for fleet related services.

Traxall is operating in Europe and Latin America in 35 markets with top market positions in each of the countries.

At Traxall I am tasked with leading and driving the international commercial strategy including Sales, Account Development, Marketing and Business Partner Management together with the country teams.
Building an International Sales & Marketing Team, closing international deals and seeking Partners in to be developed countries
profile_positions.title: International Business Development Director

company.name: ARI Fleet Europe (formely HPI Fleet & Mobility)

profile_positions.company: ARI Fleet Europe (formely HPI Fleet & Mobility)
profile_positions.description:
ARI, part of the USA headquartered Holman Automotive Group, is a global vehicle fleet management organization that drives the best results for each of its clients’ unique and complex needs. 

Responsibility:
Develop an increased focus on growing the Benelux operations into the next step including team coaching, sales, new service developments and service excellence.

With a centralized Benelux office in Belgium I have been combining home-office (NL) with frequent on-site and external business tasks in Belgium. Great understanding of the Belgian culture and business practice.

Tasks:
- Developing the Benelux' commercial strategy
- Coaching of Benelux account and implementation management team
- New (international and Benelux) client and consulting acquisitions
- Strategic account management
- Building partnerships with suppliers for additional service offering
- Client consulting, quality improvement & service excellence projects
profile_positions.title: International Sales Manager & Commercial Manager Benelux

profile_positions.description:
Newly created position

HPI is a privately held independent international Fleet & Supply Chain Management Company. Corporate headquarter is based in Frankfurt, Germany and a centralised Benelux office in Mechelen, Belgium.

Responsibility:
Develop a local German fleet management company into an international business footprint. 
After the win of a new EMEA client my role was to steer the business plan, the roll out of the 15 new European operations including business partnerships and the local appointed account management team and international sales coordinator running the country implementations. 

The new operations set up and implementation roll out took place within 9 months. Thereafter I focussed on consolidating and auditing the country service delivery to ensure client satisfaction before executing my international sales again.

This exciting journey required a very entrepreneurial drive, team spirit, being creative and mostly bringing newly formed country teams into a harmonised group performing service excellence.

Tasks:
- Developing the international sales strategy
- New international client & consulting acquisitions
- Central coordinator for the roll out of 15 new European operations incl. business partner network
- Leading the international client implementations including team
- Business partner manager (Nordics) & strategic account manager
- Managing local and international client consulting projects & internal quality audits
- Managing the foundation of a product & service library for international bid management
profile_positions.title: International Sales & Business Development Manager - Building an international footprint

profile_positions.description:
Newly created position

Masterlease, part of General Motors, is a multi-brand car leasing company in 17 countries. EU headquarters in Birmingham, UK which I reported directly into.

Responsibility: 
To to lead, develop and transform a 'country-by-country' Opel captive leasing business into an international multi-brand car leasing company. With an entrepreneurial approach, by creativity and a 'never give up' mindset a successful international sales footprint was developed. 

This included the foundation of a strong and motivated team, consistent service delivery and market approach with happy clients from the Fortune 500 in a very competitive industry. A great period, being able to build something from scratch turning into a recognized partner.

Tasks:
- Developing an international sales team (17 countries) incl. team management for AT/BE/GER/NL
- New international client acquisitions and strategic account management in 17 countries
- Collaboration with GM Europe to work on a joint sales approach
- New client implementations
profile_positions.title: International Sales Manager, Member of the International Sales Leadership Team

profile_positions.description:
Newly created position

Responsibility:
Develop a major account department including building a team with a bespoke approach and services that meet the needs of companies with large national fleets. 

Tasks:
- Building a large account strategy including developing a team and service portfolio
- Team Manager of 3 sales executives
- New client acquisitions, strategic account management and international cross selling
profile_positions.title: Manager Key Accounts & International Sales, Member of the Country Line Management Team

profile_positions.description:
Newly created position

Coordinating international cross selling activities between the countries of Masterlease Group

Tasks:
- Identifying international opportunities for other countries through national clients
- Winning and implementing opportunities from other countries
- Harmonising services among the countries
- Building a consistent international product and service library and price matrices
profile_positions.title: International Sales Coordinator

profile_positions.description:
Tasks:
- Acquiring and managing national key accounts
profile_positions.title: Sr. Key Account & Sales Manager

profile_positions.description:

profile_positions.title: Regional Account & Sales Manager
